lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I like to read about people's lives on the other side of the world!
lender.occupational_info: I teach Deaf kids in american sign language.

lender.name: Keren
lender.loan_because: I want to pay forward the help that I continue to receive from wonderful people.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: This is a brilliant idea and I want to help.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: Everyone here is trying to improve their own situation and all they need is a little help.

lender.name: Carol and Brian
lender.loan_because: We wanted to share our own good fortune and to help our world neighbours to build a better future for themselves. We have a particular interest in encouraging women's businesses, especially those involving textiles, handcrafts and food products. We would like to see much more political power in the hands of hardworking and committed women all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Carol is a recently-retired company director enjoying the luxury of freedom from work. Brian is Technical Director of a hi-tech electronics company and just thinks his work is great fun!

lender.name: lorraine
lender.loan_because: I belive the given help to some one is one of the best thing you can do in life.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with children who are blind.

lender.name: David Andreas
lender.loan_because: Lending through Kiva requires so little effort, but can really change the lives of good people in countries that fail to support them.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.occupational_info: I work in professional practice as a share & business valuer.

lender.name: Baker@DCHS
lender.loan_because: because we want to help. We share and we care. We aren't afraid to lend people in other countries money.
lender.occupational_info: We go to school and learn. We are getting an education to have a career and better our future.

lender.name: Lisa and Stephen
lender.loan_because: We've been greatly blessed and want to share with others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Serving God and encouraging others to do the same.

lender.name: Heli
lender.loan_because: Just .... I can make something good

lender.name: Alexandra I. Pechirra
lender.loan_because: I believe everything happens for a reason ... so if you get a chance, take it. If it changes your life, let it! ;)

lender.name: David and Jen
lender.loan_because: Because we have been given much we to must give.
lender.occupational_info: I rent and sell equipment to help people appreciate the outdoors

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to work hard to persevere through adversities deserves a chance

lender.name: Alistair
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in others lives especially those that want to do something for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Skúli
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Software test developer.

lender.name: Marlie
lender.loan_because: I teach children with challenges. What more important thing could I teach them than to help others?
lender.occupational_info: Loving and helping children

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: .......it is no reason to not do it.........

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful initiatif, and I'm glad to help out other entrepreneur.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: It is but the grace of God that I was born in a Country where many opportunites are available. I don't take that for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I sell and support various Telecommunitcation products to Business Customers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give

lender.name: Lee Family
lender.loan_because: The Lord blesses us to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my children at home and help people stay healthy through exercise and proper diet.

lender.name: Adora
lender.loan_because: success starts with being given a chance.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: It takes a world to raise a child, and we're all in that business.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It's one more way that I can hopefully make a positive difference for an individual, their family and the community that they live in.
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses and individuals be the best that they can be.

lender.name: Bart & Julija
lender.loan_because: it is exactly what we wanted.

lender.name: Kurinji
lender.loan_because: We feel like We can help more people with same money.
lender.occupational_info: Basically, work in computer software.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: it's a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I work for a professional body for surgeons. I am setting up a system of regulation.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I sold my car recently so I could live a greener life. With th money I got back from the car, I am trying to make wise investments for my future and want to help other women do the same. I'm interested in learning about green investing and other such things. Microlending makes so much sense for me right now as someone who has some extra cash to spare. Thanks Kiva!

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching researchers in child health.

lender.name: Carrol
lender.loan_because: We are keen to support other people trying to make a living, trying to improve their lives and the lives of people in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are both entrepreneurs and engineers.

lender.name: Rotary Club of Gibsons
lender.loan_because: It is the Right Thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Our Motto is: Service above Self. Our Creed is: Is it the Truth - Will it benefit all concerned - Will it build goodwill and fellowship - Is it fair to all.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: just a little bit of help can make big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I beleive that much of the unrest in the world occurs because the powerful silence the voices of the people in whatever way will work. In my mind keeping people in poverty is the greatest silencer of all. When I help someone out of poverty I help them find their voice. And once a person finds her or his voice they have a say in what happens to them. They become free.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a research hospital. My job is to review research projects and make determinations concering the safety and ethics of clinical research projects.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: Every day I read so many stories about people around the world who are struggling... I decided it was time to do my part to help.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to provide the essentials for myself, everything after that is extra, so why not help out others when I can.

lender.name: Nils
lender.loan_because: I don't know, I just want to help people. My mom showed me the Kiva site.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old, in 5th grade & I'm really good in math. I'm in a dual language school, where we learn everything in both Spanish & English. I like to surf, skateboard, play soccer, and build with Lego.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help others -- by giving them a way to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners who have lost income through employee theft or personal injury.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to give others some of the opportunities that I am so blessed to receive.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Terje
lender.loan_because: My Lord Jesus says: So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets (Matt. 7.12.) I hope to make a positive difference in some peoples lives...

lender.name: Keana & Fely
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer who's job allows me to be creative in a tight realm of rigidity but this is truly uninspiring. The causes of kiva and it's community inspire me.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help women succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I record the revenues and expenses for a business so they can track the business's financial performance.

lender.name: Debbie and Rachel
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of giving a hand up vs. a hand out
lender.occupational_info: I run the Customer Service department for a small marketing company; my daughter is an 8th grade student

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: it feels good to share. Everyday is an opportunity to do something positive. Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Improving vision for humanity.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to...do I really need a deep reason?
lender.occupational_info: I dispose of unexploded bombs, mines, projectiles and the like in order to allow land to be developed, and to safeguard people & property.

lender.name: Red Shirt
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva in a newspaper article and thought what a cool idea to be able to help others thru these loans.
lender.occupational_info: i work in the tourism industry helping people with holdiay information

lender.name: Rachel Devlin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling that I get when I help others. I believe it is my purpose in life.

lender.name: Ceyhun
lender.loan_because: We are one.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I would waste the money on myself otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe that you can create change and help others in this world with just one small heartfelt gift!
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their travel plans, to help them experience and understand how other people live, and to provide a chance for people to remove themselves from their everyday world, hopefully returning them refreshed and renewed.

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: it's the responsible, caring thing to do!

lender.name: Joaquin
lender.loan_because: just because.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become more productive and do more with their lives.

lender.name: Daniel Catalaa
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving should be done in a way that promotes growth. So I love lending money to working people who are industrious, ambitious, and are ready to make a contribution to themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist a team of hospital interpreters. These interpreters help doctors and patients that do not speak English to communicate.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Faculty, Dept of Social Work, Cal State East Bay

lender.name: Kym
lender.loan_because: It is a great (and simple) way to empower people to make positive changes in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I import and retail fair trade products that I source from artisans in Africa.

lender.name: min dahn
lender.loan_because: this is a way i can express belonging.
lender.occupational_info: I make beautiful things.

lender.name: Peg
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I have been retired for the last 10 years helping to take care of my grandchildren

lender.name: Dr. Jean-Jacques
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other. Microcredit is a great way to develop business worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I have helped small business and start-ups here in the US (through business incubation) to grow markets worldwide. Today, we can help developing countries and individuals interested in growing their own business. This website is ideal for small entrepreneurs. We also have a complete team of business and financial experts for larger development projects.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to be like Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Communications at university to be a preacher.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I am not rich, but I like to help people who need helps.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: "Sometimes when we are generous in small, barely detectable ways it can change someone else's life forever." -Margaret Cho
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a college junior studying biology. I'm desperately seeking to do some good.

lender.name: lizzie
lender.loan_because: everyone should have someone who believes in them.

lender.name: DOUGLAS
lender.loan_because: am currently buss investing in energy and food security in our country also am in an inventory dream so I want my dream to come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in a small collage

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I know how important trust and cash is to run a business.
lender.occupational_info: Doing stuff on and with the Internets

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think each individual person can make a change in the world one step and one day at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sports management to ensure that student-athletes have the materials, instruction and opportunities to perform at their best on the playing field and in the classroom.

lender.name: Mathias
lender.loan_because: It will help people to understand and benefit of free market economy. It is a fair business for both sides.

lender.name: Chetan
lender.loan_because: Stimulating people and promoting entrepreneurship, more businesses provides more jobs.
lender.occupational_info: An online TV listings site

lender.name: Benton Jr High Economics
lender.loan_because: My 9th grade Economics classes chose KIVA as a community service work. It is exciting to see how individuals can make a difference in so many lives.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: A small thing can make a great difference.

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: To help promote peace, compassion, and goodwill

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: Not all of us are lucky enough to live in rich modern countries.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world beyond my door.

lender.name: David C
lender.loan_because: The way to provide aid is to initially give grants, and later to promote trade. Microfinancing handles both.
lender.occupational_info: IT in Financial Services.

lender.name: Aleks
lender.loan_because: I am excited my (small) gift will have a huge impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive administrator in a provessional services firm. I support a vice chairman both in his professional and personal life.

lender.name: Shirl & Lib
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do to make this world a better place for everyone!

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family's business with success & I need to share with people who are trying to make a life.
lender.occupational_info: We sell to small stores in a 60 mile radius of my home. They are all family owned. Everybody works hard for their family.

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to over 35 countries and have seen what poverty is really like and believe that the small contributions that are made by people on Kiva can and will make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write documents that teach people how to use computers.

lender.name: Pat Patterson
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a sustainable way. As it's repaid, the money I put into Kiva can be relent again and again.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: I own a small business, and I want other women around the world to be able to own businesses also.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies create reports to analyze their businesses--where the overdue accounts are, which items are most profitable, etc.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: ENABLE ME TO RENT A SHOP FOR MY GALLARY AND ALSO HELP OPHANS IN TEACHING THEM HOW TO MAKE CRAFT
lender.occupational_info: I MAKE PHOTO FRAMES, CALABASH FLOWER POT, AFRICAN CLOCKS

lender.name: Sheila
lender.occupational_info: Tampa real estate resource providing extensive property search and MLS search listings Free. Serving Tampa and St. Petersburg Real Estate search and Hillsborough and Pinellas Counties One stop source for Tampa Real Estate, new homes for sale in Tampa FL, and up-to-date MLS listings in Florida.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Actually my wife set this loan up as a birthday present to me because she knows how much I want to bless other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher. I teach science and social studies to 8th grade students.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I work on developing portable diagnostic tools for global health applications.

lender.name: Harm
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people and make them happy. By funding their needs with a loan, I am able to. If every living soul would help his neighbour, how wonderfull would this planet be?
lender.occupational_info: Teaching math is a worldly known occupation. I teach kids/adults from the age of 12 till 20. Furthermore I would describe myself as an observer of the world and study the history of the european continent.

lender.name: Quito the bandito
lender.loan_because: Individuals featured on Kiva are harding working, responsible people. Their desire to improve their lives and the lives of their families is great so why not help them achieve their goal?

lender.name: Risa
lender.loan_because: I give the guy on the corner $25 and he's back there the next day; I loan Kiva $25 and someone learns how to fish. It's not a tough call.

lender.name: Salt Lake Outreach
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Capi
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in micro-credit
lender.occupational_info: Banker

lender.name: khaldon
lender.occupational_info: International marketing. Serbian Market. Iraqi Market. Serbian Arabian Business Club www.hamurabi.co.yu

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur. Professional Photographer.

lender.name: Andre Luiz
lender.loan_because: microfinance is not the only solution to poverty, but one cornerstone tool - our constant actions of compassion and cooperation with others, around us and distant, are important.
lender.occupational_info: mathematical finance

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is a good oportunity to help people in a tangible way whilst knowing exactly where my money has gone.
lender.occupational_info: I promote to peole from ethnic minority communities that their health is important. I also teach them how to look after themselves and where to go for medical help.

lender.name: Joe & Kayla
lender.loan_because: God has truly blessed our lives with Love, Family, and Good Fortune...and we want to share those blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: Joe and I are both blessed with two wonderful children and wonderful careers. Joe works for a world wide company based out of Sweden and is in charge of making sure that the suppliers to the U.S. stores ship all the products on time and only use material vendors that are enviromentaly friendly and approved by his company. Kayla maintains relationships with current clients and establishes new relationships to further business....basically Im in sales. We hope that we are able to help people around the world to reach their goals and support their familys. Kiva is a wonderful organization and we send our Thank You to them for enabling us to help you!

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe to those much is given, much is required.

lender.name: Pallas
lender.loan_because: it is a way to be in solidarity with people.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I can. (With Mom and Dad's help)
lender.occupational_info: I am in first grade. I am learning to read and write. I am learning about the world.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help sometime.
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings and events, working for a hotel.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to give others the chance to be successful, to build their business and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Sales Consultant

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: I grew up not much better off than many of these people. It costs me no more than a few lunches to help these people get a leg up.

lender.name: Duque
lender.loan_because: i can...
lender.occupational_info: well...not the kind of work i'd like to do,like the kind that 'pushes' our world towards a better place...but hopefully in some time i'll get there. Woking on it... =)

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Honest, hard working people everywhere deserve a chance. And if the money I have sitting around doing nothing (which isn't alot) can help someone...that gives me another reason to smile when I get up in the morning.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Engineer in the computer industry. My company makes new and inventive ways to save and share data from computers.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: It's always good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: fullfilling

lender.name: Susan & Phil
lender.loan_because: KIVA was a wedding gift to us in Spetember, 2008. We feel honored to be able to help others help themselves.

lender.name: helen
lender.loan_because: RECAUDAR FONDOS PARA LA CONSTRUCION DE UNA INSTITUCION EDUCATIVA PARA NIÑOS ESPECIALES
lender.occupational_info: iMPORTANTE, YA QUE A TRAVES DE EL PUEDO AYUDAR ANIÑOS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y QUE NO PUEDEN RECIBIR UN TIPO DE EDUCACION ADECUADA

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I loan because, after living for more than a decade in various developing countries, I've seen first hand how micro loans can transform communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to at-risk, immigrant teenagers.

lender.name: The Fernie Academy
lender.occupational_info: We are a small independent school in Fernie, BC, Canada.

lender.name: Eco Fashion World
lender.loan_because: It's fun to encourage entrepreneurs to create sustainable wealth for themselves and their communities!
lender.occupational_info: We are a website that is a news portal for "ethical fashion." We talk about the latest organic and fair trade fashions!

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I believe in social entrepreneurship, and I understand the prime importance of capital to get a worthwhile idea off the ground. I believe in uplifting others by helping them uplift themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run two businesses - one is a web solutions company, and the other is the manufacture and sale of honey wine (mead)

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: we are one.

lender.name: Meara
lender.loan_because: its fun, why not

lender.name: The Walters Family
lender.loan_because: our baby girl passes away tragically at 6 months of age. We loan to change lives in memory of her short life with us.

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy. I believe in the law of karma, and I know by making good causes, my own life and the lives of others will be enriched.
lender.occupational_info: I love to knit - I taught myself how by reading a book. I am always interesting in hearing someone's knitting or sewing story. I enjoy reading a lot. I like training my Cockapoo puppy Kingston and exercising. I am one of the most fortunate people I know.

lender.name: Prashant
lender.occupational_info: Design electrical stuff that test's other electrical stuff

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe that people are inherently good. When given an opportunity that they would not have otherwise had, greatness can be achieved. My favorite quote is "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." I'm honored to be able to contribute, even in a small way, to the dreams and aspirations of so many amazing individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that encourages children to become entrepreneurs and to succeed in a global economy. I raise money to help these programs continue.

lender.name: Madison Reed
lender.loan_because:
....life's purpose is to create more happiness and beauty! We're all ONE, so how can I be happy, successful, or reach any degree of spiritual evolution if I'm cut off from the rest of the human family tree?
Giving is a way that I link myself to others.

lender.name: Bob and Sharon
lender.loan_because: We are trying to do our part to pay it forward, creating a sustainable source of capital for entrepreneurs to allow them to build a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: my brother sent me a gift certificate. I had seen Kiva before and thought microfinance was a very interesting concept. I hope it will be a sustainable way to help people get on their feet.
lender.occupational_info: I train customers, do demos and assist with technical designs for a small software company. I also work in the field with customers to install and resolve problems with the software. We make software to filter internet access and protect computers. Our primary customer is K-12 schools.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because:
It's really cool to make a difference for someone on the other side of the planet - and I'm jazzed that it's not a hand-out, but a micro-loan.
Microcredit lending works - Thanks Dr. Yunus!
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them reduce their environmental impact by making their office environment "greener."

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: Loaning to Kiva is not like giving to charity. It is a sustainable way to ensure your money goes a long way helping the poor start businesses in the country of your choice. The best part about it is that you get 100% of your money back each time!
lender.occupational_info: Microfinancing had and is continuing to have tremendous success in the development of many countries.

lender.name: Sarrah Nomanbhoy
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at Stanford University in California so that in the future I can help people and make change in the world.

lender.name: Claude G. Beaudoin
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me in the past and want to spread the feeling of hope and self-pride.
lender.occupational_info: I run and maintain a web site that offers educational material to help others better understand what stock Technical Analysis is and can do for them.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: many others have helped me in life & it's time to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I help design medical tests to diagnose human diseases.

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: Every one needs help now and again.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy being submerged into a culture other than my own. I want to learn about people and what makes them different from everyone else.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I almost lost everything at one point and I know how hard it can be to start up a business without any resources.
lender.occupational_info: I design applications for the internet, do graphic design for the internet and print, and repair computers occasionally. I am also a Apple Certified Macintosh Technician.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: Recirculating some idle cash has such a positive impact on others less fortunate - and you decide where it will be best used ... why not?

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: We live under one sky.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I make sure buildings are in good condition, which enable my company to conduct business without interruption.

lender.name: Cristele
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed. It's time to share it...

lender.name: Katharina
lender.loan_because: I was always lucky and and now it is time to give something back!

lender.name: lamazone
lender.loan_because: i believe this is a way to fight poverty and to let people with dreams, but little money fulfull these dreams.

lender.name: Kamila
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference.

lender.name: Joe C
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because:
"Si la vie humaine n'a pas de prix, nous agissons toujours comme si quelque chose dépassait, en valeur, la vie humaine... Mais quoi ?"
"Être homme, c'est précisément être responsable. C'est connaître la honte en face d'une misère qui ne semblait pas dépendre de soi. C'est être fier d'une victoire que les camarades ont remportée. C'est sentir, en posant sa pierre, que l'on contribue à bâtir le monde."
Antoine de St Exupéry
lender.occupational_info: Also a member of www.babyloan.org

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I don't have enough money of my own to change somebodies life but joining it to all the other people that can give just a little is amazing.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the community providing nursing care to people in their own homes.

lender.name: Selena
lender.loan_because: The world needs to be a better place - for all.

lender.name: Margot
lender.occupation: Titel Insurance Sales and Support Representative

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it's not a level playing field out there.
lender.occupational_info: I study how social inequalities become health inequalities.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer, wife, and mother.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: i believe it will help
lender.occupational_info: I work with great people at a great company who work together to create and sell a product that helps educate people and helps them communicate better.

lender.name: pascal
